The 11-Step DCF Process:

    Gather historical financial data
    Analyze historical performance
    Project future cash flows (5-10 years)
    Calculate discount rate (WACC)
    Calculate terminal value
    Discount cash flows to present value
    Calculate enterprise value
    Calculate equity value
    Calculate intrinsic value per share
    Compare to current market price
    Perform sensitivity analysis

Practical Example Included:

    Complete valuation of a SaaS company
    Revenue projections with growth rates
    WACC calculation with real numbers
    Terminal value using perpetuity growth method
    Final intrinsic value: $59.96 vs market price $65.00
    Investment recommendation with margin of safety analysis
